lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic deserves a "little star" next to his name for a spectacular 2015 season that saw him win three grand slams among his 11 titles but the men's game is not simply a matter of the Serb versus the rest, Roger Federer said on Saturday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic deserves a "little star" next to his name for a spectacular 2015 season that saw him win three grand slams among his 11 titles but the men's game is not simply a matter of the Serb versus the rest, Roger Federer said on Saturday....

headline.main: Federer Gives Djokovic 'Little Star' of Approval
headline.print_headline: Federer Gives Djokovic 'Little Star' of Approval
